holidays.description: Matilda had Ms. Honey, Harry had Dumbledore, and Cady had Ms. Norbury!

holidays.description: The Jewish holiday's roots are in celebration of thanksgiving for a bountiful harvest.

holidays.description: We are celebrating a national priority, with a day that honors teachers and everything education.

holidays.title: National Above the Bus Day
holidays.description: In this dog-eat-dog world, let no kind act go unseen and unrewarded.

holidays.title: National Depression Screening Day
holidays.description: Roughly 40 million adults in the U.S. struggle with depression or anxiety.

holidays.title: Portugal Republic Day

holidays.title: Vanuatu Constitution Day
holidays.description: Thanks to its constitution, Vanuatu can finally live and govern according to its own values.

holidays.title: World Meningitis Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness and stay safe from the deadly disease Meningitis before it’s too late.
